JOB DESCRIPTION:
Senior Software Developer 

Senior Software Developer /  Tech Lead with 3- 7+ years of experience in web applications programming /  customised software development.

Candidates should be proficient in any /  all of the following: VB 6.0,  SQL Server,  ASP,  ASP.NET,  C#,  VB.NET. 

He /  She should have min 3 yrs experience in VB.NET,  ASP.NET,  ASP, C#,  ADO.NET and SQL Server. He /  She must have good communication skills and have very good understanding of s/ w SDLC. Selected candidates need to join at the earliest. Selected candidates must be willing to work onsite at client locations..
